name: Ball Pain
description:
Ball Pain is next in line to join the ranks of Rage Games, The idea is to bounce to the top of the level that is composed of 5 different areas filled with obstacles designed help you fail and are equally as challenging/frustrating ensuring that your skill, patience and determination are tested, Can you get to the top before you rage ?

. Bounce your way to the very top of 5 different challenging environments.
. Plan your way around tricky obstacles designed to help you fail.
. Face the constant threat of falling and losing your progress.
. have your skill and patience tested beyond belief.
. Game time based on players skill or luck, you can replay again and again to beat your best time.

This game is intended to be difficult and annoying, please keep that in mind when playing and remember determination is the key.
